name: Information Sharing
description: a. Enable authorized users to determine whether access authorizations assigned to a sharing partner match the information's access and use restrictions for [Assignment: organization-defined information sharing circumstances where user discretion is required]; and b. Employ [Assignment: organization-defined automated mechanisms or manual processes] to assist users in making information sharing and collaboration decisions.
supplemental_guidance: Information sharing applies to information that may be restricted in some manner based on some formal or administrative determination. Examples of such information include contract-sensitive information, classified information related to special access programs or compartments, privileged information, proprietary information, and personally identifiable information. Security and privacy risk assessments as well as applicable laws, regulations, and policies can provide useful guidance for discretionary information-sharing decisions.

attack_techniques.name: Data from Information Repositories
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Information sharing controls that enable users to verify sharing partner access authorizations ensure that data from information repositories is only accessible to properly authorized recipients, limiting unauthorized collection.

attack_techniques.name: Confluence
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Sharing controls on Confluence spaces that verify recipient authorization before enabling access prevent adversaries from exploiting overly broad sharing permissions to collect sensitive knowledge base content.

attack_techniques.name: Sharepoint
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Information sharing mechanisms on SharePoint that require users to verify sharing partner access levels prevent adversaries from accessing documents through improperly authorized sharing configurations.

attack_techniques.name: Customer Relationship Management Software
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Sharing controls on CRM platforms that verify partner access authorizations before enabling data access prevent adversaries from collecting customer data through unauthorized or overly permissive sharing.

attack_techniques.name: Messaging Applications
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Information sharing controls on messaging applications that verify recipient authorizations prevent adversaries from accessing sensitive conversations and shared files through improperly scoped sharing permissions.
